item.title: Asian shares are mixed after Wall Street sets more records for US stocks
item.description: Stock markets in Asia are mixed after U.S. stocks rose to more records as they closed out another winning week

item.title: Hong Kong's CK Hutchison seeks Chinese investor to join Panama Ports deal
item.description: A Hong Kong conglomerate that’s selling ports at the Panama Canal says it may seek a Chinese investor to join a consortium of buyers

item.title: Russia starts direct commercial flights between Moscow and Pyongyang
item.description: Russia has opened a direct air route between Moscow and Pyogyang in a move reflecting closer ties between the two countries

item.title: US and China to talk trade with eye on Trump-Xi summit later this year
item.description: U.S. and Chinese officials are meeting in Stockholm to discuss trade tariffs.

item.title: Comic-Con salutes James Gunn and gets first looks at 'Coyote vs. Acme,' and new 'Star Trek' forays
item.description: The day three highlights at Comic-Con included a standing ovation from thousands for “Superman” director James Gunn, led by John Cena
